author: Ben Winck
title: Billionaire investor Bill Ackman turned $27 million into $2.6 billion by betting that coronavirus would tank the market
description: Hedge fund billionaire Bill Ackman turned a $27 million position into a $2.6 billion windfall as the coronavirus dragged stocks to multiyear lows and threatened deep economic recession. Pershing Square Capital Management turned to credit protection on investm…
